meanings.definition: The quality of being shiny or reflective.
meanings.sent1: The glossinesses of the polished marble floor caught the sunlight beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I love the glossinesses of freshly waxed cars.
meanings.sent3: The cat couldn't resist chasing the glossinesses of light reflected off the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with the glossinesses of unshed tears.
meanings.sent5: The glossinesses of the lake at sunset were truly breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The state of having a smooth, polished appearance.
meanings.sent1: The glossinesses of the wooden table made it look brand new.
meanings.sent2: The shoes had a perfect glossinesses after being buffed.
meanings.sent3: The chef proudly presented the cake, boasting about its glossinesses.
meanings.sent4: The glossinesses of the ice made it look like a mirror.
meanings.sent5: The glossinesses of the polished silverware reflected the candlelight beautifully.
